description: Collection of required credentials for StreamChatWars

TwitchChat.description: Collection of credentials required to access Twitch Chat

username.description: Username of the chat bot, all lowercase

oauth_token.description: OAUTH token used to authenticate your chat bot, if you don't have one already, you can get it from https://twitchapps.com/tmi/

TwitchAPI.description: Collection of credentials required to access Twitch API calls.

client_id.description: Client ID of your Twitch API access key, generate at https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps

client_secret.description: Client Secret of your Twitch API access key. As the name implies, KEEP IT SECRET!

value.description: The value of the credentials, decoding is based on the type.
